                   \n                                              <div class=\"flexme flexme-article\">\n                        <div class=\"article-content\">\n                                <div>\r\n    \n<div class=\"special_article green\">Free Access</div>\n    \n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\r\n</div>\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n<div id=\"article\">\r\n    <?xml version=\"1.0\" encoding=\"ASCII\" standalone=\"yes\"?>\n<!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC \"-//W3C//DTD XHTML 1.0 Transitional//EN\" \"\">\n\n    <div id=\"annex\">\n      <h2 class=\"sec\">Table 3 </h2>\n      <p>Degrees of freedom (DOF), average logarithmic evidence (<span class=\"img-inline\"><img src=\"/articles/aa/full_html/2018/04/aa31932-17/aa31932-17-eq83.png\" width=\"52\" height=\"19\" /></span>), RMSI in arcseconds over all image systems, and total <i>&#967;</i><sup>2</sup> and their standard deviations for all lens models.</p>\n      <div class=\"tab\">\n        <table width=\"100%\" class=\"fm\" frame=\"hsides\" rules=\"groups\">\n<thead>\n<tr>\n<th align=\"center\"></th></tr>\n<tr>\n<th align=\"left\" colspan=\"5\"></th></tr>\n<tr>\n<th align=\"center\"></th></tr>\n<tr>\n<th align=\"center\"></th></tr>\n<tr>\n<th align=\"center\">Model</th>\n<th align=\"center\">DOF</th>\n<th align=\"center\"><span class=\"img-inline\"><img src=\"/articles/aa/full_html/2018/04/aa31932-17/aa31932-17-eq84.png\" width=\"52\" height=\"19\" /></span></th>\n<th align=\"center\">RMSI</th>\n<th align=\"center\"><i>&#967;</i><sup>2</sup></th>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<th align=\"center\"></th></tr>\n<tr>\n<th align=\"left\" colspan=\"5\"></th></tr>\n<tr>\n<th align=\"center\"></th></tr>\n<tr>\n<th align=\"center\"></th></tr>\n</thead>\n<tbody>\n<tr>\n<td align=\"center\"></td></tr>\n<tr>\n<td align=\"left\" colspan=\"5\"></td></tr>\n<tr>\n<td align=\"center\"></td></tr>\n<tr>\n<td align=\"center\"></td></tr>\n<tr>\n<td align=\"center\">Sect. <a href=\"/articles/aa/full_html/2018/04/aa31932-17/aa31932-17.html#S11\">4.1.2</a></td>\n<td align=\"center\">18</td>\n<td align=\"center\">&#8722; 158 &#177; 53</td>\n<td align=\"center\">0.60 &#177; 0.07</td>\n<td align=\"center\">176 &#177; 46</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td align=\"center\">Sect. <a href=\"/articles/aa/full_html/2018/04/aa31932-17/aa31932-17.html#S12\">4.1.3</a></td>\n<td align=\"center\">0</td>\n<td align=\"center\">&#8722; 64 &#177; 20</td>\n<td align=\"center\">0.56 &#177; 0.41</td>\n<td align=\"center\">60 &#177; 53</td>\n</tr>\n<tr><td align=\"left\" colspan=\"5\"><hr /></td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td align=\"center\">Sect. <a href=\"/articles/aa/full_html/2018/04/aa31932-17/aa31932-17.html#S14\">4.2.1</a></td>\n<td align=\"center\">&#8211;</td>\n<td align=\"center\">&#8211;</td>\n<td align=\"center\">0.93 &#177; 0.97</td>\n<td align=\"center\">&#8211;</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td align=\"center\">Sect. <a href=\"/articles/aa/full_html/2018/04/aa31932-17/aa31932-17.html#S15\">4.2.2</a></td>\n<td align=\"center\">&#8211;</td>\n<td align=\"center\">&#8211;</td>\n<td align=\"center\">0.03 &#177; 0.05</td>\n<td align=\"center\">&#8211;</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td align=\"center\">Sect. <a href=\"/articles/aa/full_html/2018/04/aa31932-17/aa31932-17.html#S16\">4.2.3</a></td>\n<td align=\"center\">&#8211;</td>\n<td align=\"center\">&#8211;</td>\n<td align=\"center\">0.25 &#177; 0.09</td>\n<td align=\"center\">&#8211;</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td align=\"center\">Sect. <a href=\"/articles/aa/full_html/2018/04/aa31932-17/aa31932-17.html#S17\">4.2.4</a></td>\n<td align=\"center\">&#8211;</td>\n<td align=\"center\">&#8211;</td>\n<td align=\"center\">0.13 &#177; 0.06</td>\n<td align=\"center\">&#8211;</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td align=\"center\"></td></tr>\n<tr>\n<td align=\"left\" colspan=\"5\"></td></tr>\n<tr>\n<td align=\"center\"></td></tr>\n<tr>\n<td align=\"center\"></td></tr>\n<tr>\n<td align=\"center\"></td></tr>\n</tbody></table>\n      </div>\n      <div class=\"history\">\n<div><a name=\"TFN3\" id=\"TFN3\"></a>\n<p><b>Notes.</b>\nValues are obtained from 30 Lenstool models for CL0024 using the multiple image systems of <a href=\"/articles/aa/full_html/2018/04/aa31932-17/aa31932-17.html#T1\">Table 1</a> as\nconstraints (second row), or only system 1 of <a href=\"/articles/aa/full_html/2018/04/aa31932-17/aa31932-17.html#T1\">Table 1</a> (third row). RMSI in arcseconds over all image systems for\nthe Grale models generated with the multiple image systems of <a href=\"/articles/aa/full_html/2018/04/aa31932-17/aa31932-17.html#T1\">Table 1</a> (fourth row), using system 1 (fifth row),\nusing all points of <a href=\"/articles/aa/full_html/2018/04/aa31932-17/aa31932-17.html#T2\">Table 2</a> (sixth row), and using all points of <a href=\"/articles/aa/full_html/2018/04/aa31932-17/aa31932-17.html#T2\">Table 2</a> including small-scale mass\ncorrections (last row).</p></div>\n</div>\n    </div>\n  \n\r\n</div>\r\n\r\n    <div id=\"metrics-tabs\" data-doi=\"10.1051/0004-6361/201731932\" data-edps_ref=\"aa31932-17\">\n<nav class=\"toolbar\">\n\t<button class=\"toolbar-item\" id=\"metrics-siq\">Current usage metrics</button>\n\t<button class=\"toolbar-item\" id=\"info\">About article metrics</button>\n    \n\t\n\t<button class=\"toolbar-item\" id=\"return\">Return to article</button>\n</nav>\n\n<div class=\"panel\" data-for=\"metrics-siq\">\n</div>\n\n<div class=\"panel\" data-for=\"metrics-alm\"></div>\n\n<div class=\"panel\" data-for=\"info\">\n\t\n\n\t<p>Current usage metrics show cumulative count of Article Views (full-text article views including HTML views, PDF and ePub downloads, according to the available data)  and Abstracts Views on Vision4Press platform.</p>\n\n\t<p>Data correspond to usage on the plateform after 2015. The current usage metrics is available 48-96 hours after online publication and is updated daily on week days.</p>\n\n\t<div class=\"msg msg-info\">\n\t\t<span class=\"ico ico-info\"></span>\n\t\t<div>\n\t\t\t<p>Initial download of the metrics may take a while.</p>\n\t\t</div>\n\t</div>\n\n\n</div>\n\n\n\n\n</div>\n<script type=\"text/javascript\" src=\"/templates/source/js/metrics-tab.js\"></script>\n\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\n                                                    </div>\n                        <nav class=\"article\">\n
